product_description:
Introducing the new Route One Super Baggy Denim Shorts in Gingerbread. The shorts are made from a heavy-duty 13oz 100% cotton fabric, and come in an oversized baggy fit. They feature a coin and back pocket embroidery detail, designed here at the Route One HO!

Every time you choose an item designed by our team here at Route One, we will donate 1% of the value to an approved Environmental Charity, working hard to make the world a better, safer, and healthier place for all.Click here to read more.
